Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.Counter

  • Packages that use Counter 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.

    • Uses of Counter in org.strongback.components

      Methods in org.strongback.components that return Counter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Counter Counter.circular(int maximum)
      Create a new counter that will increment by 1 and that upon reaching the supplied maximum value will upon the next increment() call automatically reset to 0.
      static Counter Counter.circular(int initial, int increment, int maximum)
      Create a new counter that will increment by the specified amount and that upon reaching the supplied maximum value will upon the next increment() call automatically reset to the given initial value.
      Counter Counter.increment()
      Increment the counter.
      static Counter Counter.unlimited()
      Create a new counter that will monotonically increment by 1 and upon reaching the maximum integer value will upon the next increment() call automatically reset to 0.
      static Counter Counter.unlimited(int initial)
      Create a new counter that will monotonically increment by 1 and upon reaching the maximum integer value will upon the next increment() call automatically reset to 1.
      Counter Counter.zero()
